Articles.Content: So, continuing my apparent trend of asking the community to make up for my bad memory, I'd like to ask if anyone knows of a current mod that offers a camera part, rather than offering "improved chase cam", etc. I've got nothing against those mods, they're just not what I'm looking for. I know that BDArmory has a camera part, but that mod basically kills my PC (since I play on a potato), and I know that ALCOR had a camera part that only worked with RPM. Is there another mod that offers a camera part?
